data.title: David Rovics Is A Nazi by davidrovics
data.meta_description: Stream David Rovics Is A Nazi by davidrovics on desktop and mobile. Play over 320 million tracks for free on SoundCloud.
data.text:
published on 2022-12-07T03:03:11Z

I'm on a west coast tour this week, and as usual, someone's trying to get my gigs canceled. Â Gig hosts are generally horrified to hear from someone telling them they're hosting a Nazi performer, but in the end they find the argument unconvincing. Â I thought my critics needed a theme song, to get their message across more effectively, so I wrote one.

Genre

Folk & Singer-Songwriter
